description: Try our customer's take on the old favorite.
keywords: Coleslaw,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Tomato,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Coleslaw Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely slice the lettuce and cabbage and put into a large bowl. Slice capsicum, onion, cucumber and solid outer part of tomato into sticks. Grate the carrots. Place into the bowl and mix all together.
Finally mix 2 heaped tablespoons of your favourite mayonnaise through the salad. Add more mayonnaise to taste.
